chart.name: Disk space %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.core_totalspace').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.solr.core_usablespace').publish(label='B', enable=False)
E = (100*B/A).publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (E).min().publish(label='F')
G = (E).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='G')
H = (E).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='H')
I = (E).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='I')
J = (E).max().publish(label='J')

chart.name: GC% over last minute
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_cms_count').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_cms_time').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_parnew_count').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_parnew_time').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_cms_time').timeshift('1m').publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = ((B-E)/60).mean().publish(label='F')
I = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_parnew_time').timeshift('1m').publish(label='I', enable=False)
J = ((D-I)/60).mean().publish(label='J')

chart.name: Heap %
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.jvm_total_memory').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.solr.jvm_total_memory_used').publish(label='B', enable=False)
E = (100*B/A).publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = (E).min().publish(label='F')
G = (E).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='G')
H = (E).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='H')
I = (E).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='I')
J = (E).max().publish(label='J')

chart.name: Top Nodes by JVM Memory Usage
Top Nodes by JVM Heap Usage

publishLabelOptions.displayName: gauge.solr.core_num_docs - Mean by collection,shard - Sum by collection
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.name: Search Request Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.search_query_response').mean(over='30s').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).max().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (A).min().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Update Request Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.update_request_handler_response', filter=filter('collection', 'deep_collection')).mean(over='30s').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).max().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='E')
F = (A).min().publish(label='F')

chart.name: Search Request Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.search_query_response').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F', enable=False)

chart.name: Top Nodes by Disk Space Usage
Update Request Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.update_request_handler_response').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).min().publish(label='B')
C = (A).percentile(pct=10).publish(label='C')
D = (A).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='D')
E = (A).percentile(pct=90).publish(label='E')
F = (A).max().publish(label='F', enable=False)

publishLabelOptions.displayName: counter.solr.search_query_requests - Mean by shard - Sum - Mean(15s)
publishLabelOptions.label: A

chart.name: GC% over last minute
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_cms_count').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_cms_time').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_parnew_count').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_parnew_time').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_cms_time').timeshift('1m').publish(label='E', enable=False)
F = ((B-E)/60).mean().publish(label='F')
I = data('gauge.solr.jvm_gc_parnew_time').timeshift('1m').publish(label='I', enable=False)
J = ((D-I)/60).mean().publish(label='J')

chart.name: % Disk Space Usage
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.core_totalspace').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.solr.core_usablespace').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = ((A-B) * 100 / A).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Doc growth
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.solr.core_max_docs').mean(by=['shard']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('gauge.solr.core_num_docs').mean(by=['shard']).sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('gauge.solr.core_deleted_docs').mean(by=['shard']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (B).timeshift('1h').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = (((B-D)/D)).publish(label='E')
